thread.title: Iranian leader: Trump showing the 'true face of America'
thread.title_full: Iranian leader: Trump showing the 'true face of America' | Washington Examiner

author: Kyle Feldscher
title: Iranian leader: Trump showing the 'true face of America'
text:
President Trump 's immigration order shows "the true face of America," Iran's supreme ruler said in a series of tweets Tuesday morning.
Ayatollah Ali Khamenei tweeted that Trump has been beneficial to Iran because he shows what America truly is and he is doing "the job for us."
"New #POTUS says Iran should've appreciated Obama! How come? Appreciate him for #DAESH, war in Iraq &Syria or public support for 2009 unrest?" Khamenei tweeted.
"#Trump says be scared of me! No, Iranians will respond to such words with Feb. 10 rallies & will show what is their position toward threats. We appreciate Trump! Because he largely did the job for us in revealing true face of America. What we've been saying in thirty some years – of corruption in US government – #Trump has outspokenly said during his campaign & in office."
Subscribe today to get intelligence and analysis on defense and national security issues in your Inbox each weekday morning from veteran journalists Jamie McIntyre and Jacqueline Klimas.

He added, "Now #Trump with actions like handcuffing a 5-year-old kid, shows what the truth of US is & what American human rights means! #MuslimBan"
New #POTUS says Iran should've appreciated Obama! How come? Appreciate him for #DAESH , war in Iraq &Syria or public support for 2009 unrest?— Khamenei.ir (@khamenei_ir) February 7, 2017 
#Trump says be scared of me! No, Iranians will respond to such words with Feb. 10 rallies & will show what is their position toward threats.— Khamenei.ir (@khamenei_ir) February 7, 2017 
We appreciate Trump! Because he largely did the job for us in revealing true face of America.— Khamenei.ir (@khamenei_ir) February 7, 2017 
What we've been saying in thirty some years – of corruption in US government – #Trump has outspokenly said during his campaign & in office.— Khamenei.ir (@khamenei_ir) February 7, 2017 
Now #Trump with actions like handcuffing a 5-year-old kid, shows what the truth of US is & what American human rights means! #MuslimBan — Khamenei.ir (@khamenei_ir) February 7, 2017 
Trump has used Twitter to rattle sabers with Iran in the last week, jabbing at Iran for violating a United Nations resolution by testing a ballistic missile and warning the Islamic Republic to behave.
On Tuesday, he said Iran is the top state sponsor of terror and compared Obama's diplomatic relationship with Iran to media coverage of his praise of Russian President Vladimir Putin.
Also from the Washington Examiner I think you mean Crimea, congresswoman. The congresswoman's remarks come after she said last week that she hoped Trump wouldn't last a full term.
By Becket Adams • 02/07/17 6:41 PM Top Story The challenge to Trump's order? It has a lot to do with money  
By Byron York • 02/07/17 4:13
